name: Pro Longer Hair Thickening Shampoo for Split Ends
about: What it is: A hair thickening shampoo formulated with exclusive technology that reduces the appearance of split ends for visibly longer, more volumnious, and healthier-looking hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, and Curly..Hair Type: Fine..Hair Concerns:.- Thinning.- Volumizing.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage..Key Benefits:.- Gently cleanses while thickening ends for fuller-looking hair.- Visibly reduces breakage and appearance of split ends.- Adds volume with five times more shine..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Amino Acid: Prevents breakage and strengthens hair..- Filler A-100: Exclusive technology that penetrates the hair fiber to visibly thicken damaged or split ends...What Else You Need to Know: Leave your damaged split ends in the past with this thickening shampoo powered by exclusive professional techonology and amino acids. The unique formula strengthens and instantly fills the hair surface to minimize breakage and reduce the appearance of split ends. Use as a stylist-recommended solution for more voluminous, durably thicker ends that promote noticeably longer hair with 5x more shine from root to tip...Fragrance Description: A luxurious fragrance formulated with top notes of apple and muguet, middle notes of rose and cyclamen, and base notes of musk and amber...Clinical Results: In an instrumental test with Pro Longer Hair Thickening Shampoo + Pro Longer Hair Thickening Conditioner vs. unwashed hair:.- Reduces breakage by 94%.- Reduces appearance of split ends by 17%.- Delivers 5x more shine to the hair
ingredients: - Amino Acid: Prevents breakage and strengthens hair..- Filler A-100: Exclusive technology that penetrates the hair fiber to visibly thicken damaged or split ends...Aqua / Water / Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Amodimethicone, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-10, Glycerin, Salicylic Acid, Glycol Distearate, Arginine, Panthenol, Mica, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Peg-100 Stearate, Linalool, Steareth-6, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Coco-Betaine, Trideceth-3, Hydroxycitronellal Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Aminopropyl Triethoxysilane, Acetic Acid, Fumaric Acid, Polyquaternium-6, Parfum / Fragrance
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Distribute evenly through wet hair and massage until lather..-Rinse thoroughly..-Follow up with Pro Longer Conditioner or Mask (sold separately). .-Complete with full Pro Longer system for maximum results... Recycling Instructions:.-Remove pump and dispose into its proper container..-Thoroughly rinse out any remaining product inside bottle, then dry. .-Place bottle in your recycling bin.

reviews.review_text: This weighed down my hair so badly. My hair, especially my roots, looked so oily and dirty, as if I hadn't showered for a week, but it hadn't even been 6 hours after I showered. I could see this being better for someone with thicker and/or drier hair that wants a smoothing shampoo that will leave their hair soft and shiny. Definitely don't recommend for fine hair; the shampoo just coats your hair, which weighs it down terribly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free through Influenster for review purposes.  I actually really liked this! I had a lot of split ends going on and was desperately in need of a haircut, but had a huge improvement in the appearance when using the shampoo and conditioner together. I was worried the creaminess would weigh my hair down, my hair is pretty fine, but am happy to report that wasn’t the case! I wash my hair 2-3 times per week and was able to keep that wash cycle going without greasiness issues.  The scent is AMAZING! I’m terrible with descriptions and struggle with some scented products, and even though I believe this to be some type of floral scent I had no issues! The scent reminds my of a toy from my childhood, Charmkins, which I always loved! I have this on my repurchase list!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was thrilled to have the opportunity to try out the L'Oréal Pro Longer line, as my long, aging hair could use some tender loving care. The Lengths Renewing Shampoo comes in a beautiful semi-transparent bottle with a fuchsia rose color, which is different from the Conditioner and Mask in the line. Additionally, the scent of the shampoo is more botanical and floral, while the others have a sweet and fruity aroma. Personally, I don't mind the moderate intensity of this fragrance, but it could be an issue for those with sensitivity to scents.  The formula is thick, creamy, and lathers exceptionally well, so I find that I don't need much to work into my scalp. After rinsing, I was pleased to see that my hair was not stripped of moisture, unlike other shampoos. Instead, it felt smooth, hydrated, and clean, ready for the next step. When used in conjunction with the conditioner and mask, my hair was easy to detangle out of the shower, felt softer and stronger once dried. While I will continue using this product, I wish that it had cleaner ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I would definitely recommend this product for anyone looking to bump their hair game and grow length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, a great shampoo to help with damaged hair  that’s adds more shine/volume and minimizes split ends. I didn’t see the benefits until my third wash, definitely saw additional volume and more shine. The bottom of my hair is quite damaged as I grow out my hair from going silver from black, so easily saw the difference after using this system consistently. I can’t exactly explain the scent, but it’s a nice signature professional scent, something similar to scents you love at a salon. A little goes a long way and the shampoo lathers very well. My hair feels clean and I’m able to comb through my wet hair without needing any kind of leave in conditioner. I did wish it provided some scalp benefits to help promote additional hair health. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a product that checks all the boxes. First I would like to start from the vantage point of a acne prone middle aged consumer with a massive mane!  Finding a product that tames and nourishes my coarse long Hair that does not break me out, and also does not weigh it down has been nearly impossible to find until now.  When you have thick coarse hair it’s important to find a product that can get to your scalp and clean it well.  Most products to clean well dry your hair out, that is not the case with this product. This is where investing in a product from a company like Loreal that spends $1 billion a year in research pays off. Before and after photos are accurate. My hair was smooth, soft clean, and shiny.  I didn’t even have to use a blow dry protectant!  Most products can’t achieve this even while using products like coconut oil and Shea butter that break you out. I am beyond elated at the fact that this product made my hair look phenomenal while also not destroying my skin. The icing on the cake which is normally my last priority is the packaging. The pump streamlined the experience of effortlessly dispensing the product.
